title: Yorkshire sands
creator_credit: British Transport Films and Tony Thompson
brief_description: Light verse and gay music make their own comment on the holiday makers of the Yorkshire coastline. Between Tees and Humber thousands each year enjoy the sea and the ands, the funfair, and the ballroom; for a row or a romance, there’s something for each.
